name: No Title
description:
Yeah this is all I've got. I need a story before I really start working. This is just a test for what it'll look like and feel like when it's further along.  I'm working on visuals and programming so I'm not responsible for the story.  

TO PLAY:

Unpack the zip file for your system and run the .exe if you're on WIndows, run the .app if you're on a Mac.

I think. I haven't ever used a Mac so I don't really know.
